title: bg-q : spack compiler find adds front-end compilers for cnk
body:
#1980 is still in progress for proper `bg-q` support but adding this issue for tracking purpose:

`spack compiler find` on `bg-q` adds compiler for both `front-end` and `back-end`. For example, here is auto-detected `compilers.yaml ` file:

```bash
compilers:
- compiler:
    flags: {}
    modules: []
    operating_system: redhat6
    paths:
      cc: /usr/lib64/ccache/gcc
      cxx: /usr/lib64/ccache/g++
      f77: /usr/bin/gfortran
      fc: /usr/bin/gfortran
    spec: gcc@4.4.7
- compiler:
    flags: {}
    modules: []
    operating_system: cnk
    paths:
      cc: /usr/lib64/ccache/gcc
      cxx: /usr/lib64/ccache/g++
      f77: /usr/bin/gfortran
      fc: /usr/bin/gfortran
    spec: gcc@4.4.7
- compiler:
    flags: {}
    modules: []
    operating_system: redhat6
    paths:
      cc: /opt/ibmcmp/vacpp/bg/12.1/bin/xlc_r
      cxx: /opt/ibmcmp/vacpp/bg/12.1/bin/xlc++
      f77: /opt/ibmcmp/xlf/bg/14.1/bin/xlf_r
      fc: /opt/ibmcmp/xlf/bg/14.1/bin/xlf2008
    spec: xl@12.1
- compiler:
    flags: {}
    modules: []
    operating_system: cnk
    paths:
      cc: /opt/ibmcmp/vacpp/bg/12.1/bin/xlc_r
      cxx: /opt/ibmcmp/vacpp/bg/12.1/bin/xlc++
      f77: /opt/ibmcmp/xlf/bg/14.1/bin/xlf_r
      fc: /opt/ibmcmp/xlf/bg/14.1/bin/xlf2008
    spec: xl@12.1
```
Also we need to add support for detection of compilers for `cnk` i.e. `bgxl*` and `powerpc64-bgq-linux-*`.

Edit: for other bg-q users, adding `compilers.yaml` that I manually created:

```bash
compilers:
- compiler:
    modules: []
    operating_system: redhat6
    paths:
      cc: /usr/lib64/ccache/gcc
      cxx: /usr/lib64/ccache/g++
      f77: /usr/bin/gfortran
      fc: /usr/bin/gfortran
    spec: gcc@4.4.7
- compiler:
    modules: []
    operating_system: redhat6
    paths:
      cc: /opt/ibmcmp/vacpp/bg/12.1/bin/xlc_r
      cxx: /opt/ibmcmp/vacpp/bg/12.1/bin/xlc++
      f77: /opt/ibmcmp/xlf/bg/14.1/bin/xlf_r
      fc: /opt/ibmcmp/xlf/bg/14.1/bin/xlf2008
    spec: xl@12.1
- compiler:
    modules: []
    operating_system: cnk
    paths:
      cc: /usr/bin/bgxlc_r
      cxx: /usr/bin/bgxlc++
      f77: /usr/bin/bgxlf_r
      fc: /usr/bin/bgxlf2008
    spec: xl@12.1
- compiler:
    modules: []
    operating_system: cnk
    paths:
      cc: /bgsys/drivers/ppcfloor/gnu-linux/bin/powerpc64-bgq-linux-gcc
      cxx: /bgsys/drivers/ppcfloor/gnu-linux/bin/powerpc64-bgq-linux-g++
      f77: /bgsys/drivers/ppcfloor/gnu-linux/bin/powerpc64-bgq-linux-gfortran
      fc: /bgsys/drivers/ppcfloor/gnu-linux/bin/powerpc64-bgq-linux-gfortran
    spec: gcc@4.4.7
```
